ModulePrefs.title: NAAP lab - Lunar Phases Lab
ModulePrefs.author: Sten Govaerts
ModulePrefs.description: The NAAP Lunar Phases Lab demonstrates how the earth-sun-moon geometry gives rise to the phases of the moon as seen from earth. A distant view of an observer looking down on earth as well as a perspective of an observer looking into the sky are used in the the simulator.
